monster.name: Young Red Dragon
monster.speed: walk 40 ft., climb 40 ft., fly 80 ft.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
trait.text: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

action.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The dragon exhales fire in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 56 (16d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Detect
legendary.text: The dragon makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.text: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the dragon must succeed on a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw or take 13 (2d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone.

monster.description: Young red dragons are cruel and greedy.

monster.name: Acolyte
monster.spells: light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy, bless, cure wounds, sanctuary

action.name: Club
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

monster.description: Acolytes are junior members of a clergy.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
trait.text: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Scimitar
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

reaction.name: Parry
reaction.text: The goblin adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it.
